argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: although there aren't enough bins and bag-dispensers for dog dirt.

argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: One reason for this is that they have thus far hardly had to fear the consequences despite the obligation to clean up.

argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: A higher fine, so dog owners would have to dig deeper into their pockets, is supposed to be a deterrent after all.

argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: The city, especially the green spaces, should be kept tidy after all,

argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: for they are there for our recreation.

argSrc: Dog owners should pay higher fines for dog dirt left on pavements,
argTrg: Besides you're not allowed to leave other rubbish without punishment.

argSrc: although there aren't enough bins and bag-dispensers for dog dirt.
